# Class ToolCallResponseData

Class for managing a collection of tool call results.

This class provides functionality to manage multiple tool call results as a single unit. It can be constructed from either an array of ToolCallResultInterface objects or an external reference. It extends BaseData to provide consistent lifecycle management and external reference handling.

#### Example


```
// Create from array of resultsconst results: ToolCallResultInterface[] = [  &#123; toolCallId: 'call_1', result: '&#123;"weather": "sunny"&#125;' &#125;,  &#123; toolCallId: 'call_2', result: '&#123;"time": "14:30"&#125;' &#125;];const listResults = new ToolCallResponseData(results);// Get all resultsconst allResults = listResults.getToolCallResponse();console.log(allResults.length); // 2// Clean uplistResults.destroy();

```


##### Index

### Constructors

constructor

### Methods

destroy getToolCallResponse isValid

## Constructors

### constructor

  * new ToolCallResponseData(external: any): [ToolCallResponseData]()

Creates a new ToolCallResponseData instance.

#### Parameters

    * external: any

External reference to the list tool calls results data

#### Returns [ToolCallResponseData]()

Overrides BaseData.constructor




## Methods

### destroy

  * destroy(): void

Destroys the ToolCallResponseData instance and frees associated resources.

This method cleans up all internal ToolCallResult instances and then calls the parent destroy method. It should be called when the object is no longer needed to prevent memory leaks.

#### Returns void

Overrides BaseData.destroy




### getToolCallResponse

  * getToolCallResponse(): [ToolCallResultInterface](/interfaces/common_data_types_external_tool_call_data.ToolCallResultInterface)[]

Gets all tool call results as an array of ToolCallResultInterface objects.

This method returns the tool call results either from the cached internal array or by extracting them from the external reference if the cache is not available.

#### Returns [ToolCallResultInterface](/interfaces/common_data_types_external_tool_call_data.ToolCallResultInterface)[]

Array of tool call result interfaces




### isValid

  * isValid(): any

Checks if the ToolCallResponseData instance is valid.

#### Returns any

True if the instance is valid, false otherwise
